Learning_VBG.definition: The act of gaining knowledge or skills.
Learning_VBG.image: A person studying with books and a laptop.
Learning_VBG.example: Learning new things keeps your brain active.

new_JJ.definition: Not existing before; recently created or discovered.
new_JJ.example: She bought a new car last week.

language_NN.definition: A system of communication used by a community or country.

challenging_JJ.definition: Demanding effort or skill; difficult in a stimulating way.
challenging_JJ.image: A person climbing a steep hill.

rewarding_JJ.image: A trophy or a proud smile.
rewarding_JJ.example: Helping others is a rewarding experience.

journey_NN.definition: An act of traveling from one place to another; often used metaphorically.
journey_NN.image: A long road leading into the horizon.
journey_NN.example: Learning English is a long journey.

opens_VBZ.definition: To make something accessible or available.
opens_VBZ.image: An open door with light shining through.
